duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive Commercial Motor Vehicle (Tractor-trailer) combination, usually long distances, to transport and off-load compressed and liquefied industrial gases to customers or to storage sites in a safe, timely, accurate, and courteous manner.
Perform pre & post trip inspections to identify any maintenance action that may be required and act appropriately if action is needed.
Report all accidents, possible injuries, safety issues, driving citations, and customer complaints to include service interruptions immediately to their supervisor.
Complete and submit reports as required by the DOT and/or Airgas company policy.

education_certification.credential: Class A CDL with HazMat and Tanker endorsements
